name: Application
desc: A representation of an application on the user’s device.

items.name: init(bundleIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Creates an object that represents the app with the specified bundle identifier.

items.name: init(token: ApplicationToken)
items.desc: Creates an object that represents the app with the specified token.

items.name: let bundleIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The unique string that identifies this app.

items.name: let token: ApplicationToken?
items.desc: An opaque representation of a specific web domain.

items.name: let localizedDisplayName: String?
items.desc: A localized display name for the application.

items.name: static func == (Application, Application) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values aren’t equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.
